title: BOSAI: Science that Can Save Your Life

episodes.description: Japan has a long history of natural disasters. BOSAI explores how to overcome them and save lives with the power of science. In this first episode, we'll look at the latest in tsunami research.
episodes.subtitle: #1 TSUNAMI
episodes.title: BOSAI: Science that Can Save Your Life

episodes.description: Many Japan cities sit in low-lying areas, putting them at risk of floods. This program looks at the unique mechanisms of urban flooding such as sewage backflow, and explores ways to save lives.
episodes.subtitle: #2 URBAN FLOODING
episodes.title: BOSAI: Science that Can Save Your Life

episodes.description: When Typhoon Jebi struck Osaka in 2018, strong gusts caused destruction of buildings in unforeseeable ways. We'll look at how urban structures may have intensified the storm's wind.
episodes.subtitle: #3 URBAN WINDSTORMS
episodes.title: BOSAI: Science that Can Save Your Life
